name: Call of Duty

script.exe: drive_c/Program Files/Soldier of Fortune II - Double Helix/SoF2.exe

content:
exe: drive_c/Program Files/Soldier of Fortune II - Double Helix/SoF2.exe
game:
  arch: win32
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- insert-disc:
    requires: Setup/SoF2.exe
- task:
    executable: $DISC/Setup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    __GL_ExtensionStringVersion: '17700'
